title: The Possibility of Love at First Sight - Novel Updates
tags: C*nnilingus   Female Protagonist   First Love   First-time Interc**rse   Generals   Handsome Male Lead   Love at First Sight   Omegaverse   Soldiers
author: San Shui Yi Fan   三水一番
description:
In an omegaverse world, a talented recessive omega has been enjoying her single life while tinkering away in a work place that suited her well.

Then one fine day, her rather blissful life came to an abrupt halt when an alpha basically burst into her workshop. To make things worse, she started to have her heat at that very moment.

*This is a sweet short, sm*tty romance ABO story.>
